## Type of change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature / language addition

## Checklist
- [ ] Tests pass (`npm run test:all`)
- [ ] New behavior is covered by tests
- [ ] If this adds or modifies language syntax: `language-definitions` updated and rebuilt
- [ ] Closes #<!-- issue number, if applicable -->
